content: k21 repeat 2 more times* ssk k1 k2tog k20 96 sts row 69 knit row 70 *ssk k1 k2tog k19 repeat 2 more times* ssk k1 k2tog k18 slip_stitch last st to beg of nxt round 88 sts row 71 knit row 72 *ssk k1 k2tog k17 repeat 2 more times* ssk k1 k2tog k16 slip_stitch last st to beg of nxt round 80 sts row 73 knit row 74 *ssk k1 k2tog k15 repeat 2 more times* ssk k1 k2tog k14 slip_stitch last st to beg of nxt round 72 sts row 75 *ssk k1 k2tog k13 repeat 2 more times* ssk k1 k2tog k12 slip_stitch last st to beg of nxt round 64 sts row 76 *ssk k1 k2tog k11 repeat 2 more times* ssk k1 k2tog k10 slip_stitch last st to beg of nxt round 56 sts row 77 *ssk k1 k2tog k9 repeat 2 more times* ssk k1 k2tog k8 slip_stitch last st to beg of nxt round 48 sts row 78 *ssk k1 k2tog k7 repeat 2 more times* ssk k1 k2tog k6 slip_stitch last st to beg of nxt round 40 sts row 79 *ssk k1 k2tog k5 repeat 2 more times* ssk k1 k2tog k4 slip_stitch last st to beg of nxt round 32 sts row 80 *ssk k1 k2tog k3 repeat 2 more times* ssk k1 k2tog k2 slip_stitch last st to beg of nxt round 24 sts row 81 *ssk k1 k2tog k1 repeat 2 more times* k1 16 sts row 82 cut yarn thread yarn through rem 16 sts pull tightly and weave in ends drawstring -braid three strands of yarn until the drawstring is 20 inches or desired length -weave string in and out of drawstring holes on baggie -make a knot at each end of the drawstring making sure to leave 5 inches or more to attach puff balls puff ball make 2 -cut a 2 inch by 3 inch piece of card board -wrap the yarn around the card board 75 times carefully remove the yarn from the card board in a loopy bundle -tie a piece of yarn 6 inches or longer of the same yarn as the puff ball very tightly in the middle cut the top and bottom of all the yarn loops -trim puff ball to desired size -attach the puff ball to each end of the drawstring using the extra yarn © 2011 rebecca enoch for personal use only all rights reserved 2
